steps.name: And I click on the campaigns section
And I select the option to create a new campaign
Then I select the account to which the campaign will be associated
And I set the campaign name to "My Campaign"
And I click on the "Next" button to continue
Then I upload the CSV spreadsheet with the campaign data
And I click on the "Next" button to continue
Then I select the destination numbers for the campaign
And I click on the "Send" button to send the campaign.
